Cristina Setim Freitas

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/7030084908446627
  • Última atualização do currículo em 16/04/2019

Biologist specialized in Pharmacology with broad-based background in pharmacological research, drug development, innovation and genotoxicity. Experience with in vivo and in vitro pharmacology assays. Solid knowledge and hands-on experience in genotoxicity based (GLP studies), on scientific methodologies and governing regulations (ANVISA, FDA, ICH and OCDE). Good time management and organizational skills. Ability to work independently or on a team. Tenacity and patience, to see experiments through from design to completion. Methodical approach to analyzing and processing data. Independently motivated, detail oriented and good problem-solving ability. (Texto informado pelo autor)
